description: Ensure mouse-specific event handlers have keyboard equivalents.
recommendation: Add keyboard and focus event handlers alongside mouse-specific handlers. (WCAG 2.1 SC 2.1.1,2.5.1)
algorithm: Finds elements with mouse/pointer/touch/hover handlers that lack equivalent keyboard or focus handlers.
algorithm_advanced: Detects mouse/pointer/touch/hover event attributes lacking keyboard (onkey*) or focus equivalents.
